name: Maiden Chronicles [Prototype]
description:
This game is an early prototype designed to test an overall gameplay experience. Art and mechanics are minimal and there is no audio.
*We recommend playing this game with a controller!

Follow the journey of the Beaufort Sisters across two different stories in this magical metroidvannia fairytale!

Once upon a time, two sisters were granted magical powers by a demon.
The elder sister Ilia was granted the power of Light, whereas the younger sister Sylvie was gifted the power of Darkness.

However the two sisters disagreed on how their magic should be used.

In the Light Route, play as the elder sister Ilia who seeks to destroy the demons and rid her homeland of their dangerous presence.

In the Dark Route, play as the younger sister Sylvie who aims to make the power of the fairies her own in order to become stronger.

Features

- 1 Playable level with 15+ rooms to explore
- 2 Playable characters with their own stories
- 1 Powerup per character
- A boss encounter at the end of each route
